title: Account transfer Lol
body: I can not find the account transfer button just the name change.. What do i do, I want to transfer from EUW to NA. Anyone had the same problem or is it just my client.

replies.body: Can RIOT please set some expectations as to when we will be able to transfer accounts again? I was really hoping this would be available for the start of the new season.
Happy new transferring year Ritto !! thanks for carrying about ur players and still not fixing the transfer !
Its past Nov 20 and we still cant transfer ..........

i lost ALL the project perks, i am losing ALL the XMAS event stuff. I LOVE to collect skins ad stuff from the events and i am losing everything BECause you can not care less to fix it.
That is so disappointing.
You all got tricked, it's actually 20th of november next year
Jan 17. Still in Nov 20. C'mon guys.

You sure we didn't get pranked and they actually meant Nov 2018? I got a friend whose parents didn't understand how regions worked and bought him a bunch of wrong-region RP and he wants to double transfer to use some of it. PLZ Rito, Omega Squad skins are on sale rn, and he's rly lookin' forward to that.

you can ask directly to player support to add the rp from another region to your account. i had a friend who recently started LoL and didn't read the restrictions of the prepaid cards and the support gave him the rp

It's now 2018 and I still can't transfer my account. This is shit, i've now waited so long to play with my friends and it still doesen't work. Riot keeps on fucking up, don't reply to us who needs help, or just give an update. They also fucks up so many things and they keep on coming up with excuses and so much more. Im really pissed that i can't play with my friends and that i can't transfer my accounts.

Sincerely-
Gus25132
Riot plzz fix it...

Account transfers are currently disabled until about Nov 20 due to the end of season quickly approaching. Read up on all the [**details over here**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/account-transfers-going-cooldown)!
November 25th still no transfer button, fix your shit riot

Hi,
It is past Nov 20 and account transfers are still not available. Will they be here soon?
Why would you guys do this? My account is EUW and i'm living in America and can't switch so i can't play until an entire MONTH??????
agree
It is now Nov 20 but i still don't seem to find any transfer button...
almost February and still nothing haha

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=RkMijsmd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-18T02:12:41.872+0000)
>
> Account transfers are currently disabled until about Nov 20 due to the end of season quickly approaching. Read up on all the [**details over here**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/account-transfers-going-cooldown)!

Well, Nov 20th now it's december 22nd where we at.....

So rather than get upset with Rito just make a smurf account and dumpster on low Elo and new players to the game. Constantly trash talk and berate your teammates.  It literally destroys the will of new players wanting to give the game a try and subsequently Rito loses out on a bunch of new revenue and positive experience.  If you get banned, just make a new account and repeat process until your able to transfer accounts again.  If you get IP banned just buy a VPN for like 2 bucks a month, doing the above is honestly more fun then playing the game at a low ping in your own region at a higher Elo.

Got a reply today, 5-6 weeks from 25 November "tentatively". What that means is they have no idea when they will fix it and are in no hurry to do so, no point in rushing around trying to fix the transfers when they could release 100's of re-shaded skins in the same amount of time for more profit and minimal effort. 

Sadly we, the ones trying to transfer, are the minority in this game and will be treated as such.
wow..screw em

Any updates??
I mean.....21.01?
still the same problem.. it's way past nov 20 now :/

so i`m brazilian and i see one streamer and his team from brazil goes to EU and their account was transfered this week, so why for the other players this was not working?
 since is past the time that you said it will be back...
4 ijanuary stil cant transfer
Anything new about transfers?
rito plsssss
Same problem here and still cant make the transfer after Nov 20.....
exactly how much longer?

its been 3 months and still no transfer? :((((  

RIOT U done FUCKED UP
Riot, can u actually do something about transfer..... This bullshit really rages me
Maybe someone just took a sledgehammer to a bunch of computers in the office...

Why are they updating game when so many people want to transfer their accounts. Its 17.01 and i still cant transfer. I wanna play with my friends. Please fix one thing and then go on by improving the gameplay. Im euw and wanna go to eune....

It is disgusting! I am waiting for 3 months to transfer my account to Japan as I moved here, and I either got to start with a new account and forget about all my champions and skins and pay once more to get those or play with 400-500 ping which makes possible only to play with bots. RIOTs you're shameless and hope you all get at least herpes there.
I've written a support ticket and they said it will likely take about 2 - 3 more weeks.

Yo this is actually bull... Ive been waiting for 2 months to transfer my account to europe because I moved from NA to EU and you guys cant even update us on the situation. **** that, at the very least give us a progress report or statement of some sort. I dont even expect free transfers when it goes back live but cmon... I have hundreds of dollars on a level 30 account and all the champs. With this new Blue essence system i am NOT going to grind another account out to play what I already unlocked.  {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Soon i will be able to transfer.... soon... i believe
I also submitted a ticket for account transfers, was told November 22nd, it is now the 24th and still unable to xfer. Trying to go from NA to EUW :S

same here i put in a ticket got told 22nd of november now its 23rd november and they wont even respond to my new tickets that are asking for a transfer because they know they just like about transfers in last message they sent.
Same problem...

When will we have it up, it is nerly cristmas and i want to play the new urf with my firends, please fix your transfers.
It's December 20th
WHEN WE CAN TRANSFER???????
Still nothing. Anybody knows how much time it will take?
21 jan and its still not open,Riot please fix it.

Any updates??
I mean.....20.01?
So.... rito give us an up.. when.. we will can transfer our accs ?
